titles.title: A resolution reaffirming United States support for the Nicaraguan democratic resistance, and condemning the recent invasion of Honduras by Nicaragua.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Western Hemisphere Affairs.

bill.summary: 3/23/1988--Introduced. Condemns the Nicaraguan invasion of Honduras and calls upon the Nicaraguan Government forces to withdraw immediately and negotiate a ceasefire with the Nicaraguan democratic resistance. Calls upon the Nicaraguan Government to make a full accounting and issue an apology to the Honduran Government for casualties incurred. Calls for renewed U.S. support and military aid for the Nicaraguan democratic resistance.
